data.name: catgirl
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <prosody rate="0%" pitch="10%"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="cheerful" > You know {$chatter}, like... <emphasis level="strong">nya?</emphasis> </mstts:express-as> </prosody> </voice> </speak>

data.name: coinflip
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="general" > I flipped a coin and got {$result}. </mstts:express-as> </voice> </speak>
data.comment: {$result} is the return of the coin flip.

data.name: follow1
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <prosody rate="15%" pitch="0%"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="cheerful" > Hello {follower}! Thanks for the follow! </mstts:express-as> </prosody> </voice> </speak>

data.name: follow2
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <prosody rate="15%" pitch="0%"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="cheerful" > A new follower! Hello {follower}! </mstts:express-as> </prosody> </voice> </speak>

data.name: follow3
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <prosody rate="15%" pitch="0%"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="cheerful" > Serin, say hi to {follower}! </mstts:express-as> </prosody> </voice> </speak>

data.name: follow4
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <prosody rate="15%" pitch="0%"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="cheerful" > Thanks for the follow {follower}! </mstts:express-as> </prosody> </voice> </speak>

data.name: raid1
data.value: <speak xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:mstts="http://www.w3.org/2001/mstts" xmlns:emo="http://www.w3.org/2009/10/emotionml" version="1.0" xml:lang="en-US"> <voice name="en-US-SaraNeural"> <prosody rate="15%" pitch="0%"> <lexicon uri="https://c4tai.blob.core.windows.net/c4tai/lexicon.xml"/> <mstts:express-as style="terrified" > Serin look out! {raider} is raiding! </mstts:express-as> </prosody> </voice> </speak>
